## Cartesian3.normalize() method

Computes the normalized form of the supplied Cartesian.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static normalize(cartesian: Cartesian3, result?: Cartesian3): Cartesian3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cartesian | [Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md) | The Cartesian to be normalized. |
|  result | [Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md) | _(Optional)_ The object onto which to store the result. |

**Returns:**

[Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md)

The modified result parameter.
